job.title: Manager, Statistical Programming (FTE/Remote)
job.description: <p>Clinical Resource Network (CRN) is working with a growing bi-coastal oncology pharma that has an immediate need for an FTE-based Manager of Statistical Programming. The selected candidate will generate TLGs/reports, create SDTM/ADaM datasets, develop macros, validate output, support ISSs/ISEs, and contribute to in house/outsourced studies. Our client prefers local or quasi local candidates but is open to the right 100% WFH candidate as well.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Essential Duties and Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Serve as Leader for all SAS Programming activities </li><li>Manage resource allocation and budgeting for assigned projects</li><li>Resolve issues for complex SAS programming duties</li><li>Interact with global regulatory bodies</li><li>Collaborate with CRO’s</li><li>Develop Macros</li><li>Key contributor in the development of new processes or revision of existing processes.</li><li>Professional development to enhance knowledge, skills, communication, scientific methodology, operational efficiency, and compliance with policies, regulations, and corporate standards and processes</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Required Education and Experience:</u></strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Math/Statistics, or related degree</li><li>5-7+ years of Clinical Statistical Programming experience in a CRO or sponsor environment </li><li>Strong TLF, SDTM, and ADaM experience </li><li>Experience working in a Lead Programming capacity</li><li>Previous line management experience preferred</li><li>Previous oncology and/or submissions experience is a major plus, but not required</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>If this position sounds like a good fit for you, Apply Now!</strong></p>
